# Carlos Calle - Padel School Las Palmas

## About
Carlos Calle is a professional Padel Coach in Las Palmas with over 15 years of experience as an instructor and competitor at federated level. Specialized in private training and tournament preparation for Padel Tournaments Las Palmas.

## Services
- Private Padel Training: Personalized coaching for all levels
- Tournament Organization: Organizing Padel Tournaments Las Palmas
- Tournament Preparation: Specialized training for competitive play
- Kids and Adult Training Programs

## Location
Centro Comercial El Muelle, Muelle de Sta. Catalina, 1, 35008 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

## Key Pages
- Home: https://carlos-calle.pro/
- Private Training: https://carlos-calle.pro/private
- Tournaments: https://carlos-calle.pro/tournaments
- Contact: https://carlos-calle.pro/#contact

## Tournament Details
- Price: 10€ per tournament
- Schedule: Saturdays and Sundays (weather and availability dependent)
- First Tournament: 09:00 - 11:00
- Second Tournament: 11:00 - 13:00
- Format: Americano (all against all)
- Players: 12 players, 3 courts

## Contact
- WhatsApp: +34 634 774 312
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/carloscalle_padelclub/

## Languages
Available in Spanish, English, and German

## Keywords
Padel Las Palmas, Padel Coach Las Palmas, Padel Tournaments Las Palmas, Entrenador de Pádel Las Palmas, Torneos de Pádel Las Palmas
